= Details =

Easy
  # Navigate to your home directory
{{{
cd ~
}}}
  # Download the install script 
{{{
wget http://ua-ros-pkg.googlecode.com/files/install_ros_user
}}}
  # Make it executable
{{{
chmod +x install_ros_user
}}}
  # Run it!
{{{
./install_ros_user
}}}
